dct_title_s: A sketch map of part of south eastern Africa to illustrate the journeys of Dr. Lacerda (1798), the Pombeiros (1806-11), and Major Monteiro (1831-1832)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures.; "Published for the Journal of the Royal Geographic Society by John Murray ..."; Includes notes, inset: The Pomberios route from the Cazembe to Murio Aquito's [at map scale], and ancillary map: [Africa].
